name: Space Shooter Arena
description: Keep in mind, giving away a copy of the game to someone who has not purchased a copy is prohibited. - You take control over a  mini future-tank and your task is to destroy the enemies in a arena.  Space Shooter Arena is all about planning, timing and precision. If you don't time it right, you might have lost some ammunition and some priceless time. Hover through the enemies to get to the supply drops while looking over your shoulder constantly. - Installation: 1. Buy and download the game. 2. Open SpaceShooter.zip which you have downloaded  3.  Drag the folder called "SpaceShooter from inside the SpaceShooter.zip to any place in your computer. 4. Open the folder from your computer. 5. Inside the folder, find the program file called "paceshooterarena" and open it. Next time you open the game, please follow only step 4 and 5 if you have completed steps, 1, 2 and 3.
